name: Souffl3
intro: NextGen Smart Trading NFT Market on Aptos
introduce: Souffl3.com is the leading NFT marketplace and launchpad built by creators and for creators in the Aptos ecosystem. The platform’s services covers the primary and secondary NFT markets within the Aptos ecosystem, as well as NFT infra services for creators so as to simplify the development of innovative NFT projects and integrations.
